function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on insecticide-based control","Impact":"Development of resistant insect populations, harm to non-target species, and negative environmental impact","Mitigation":"Integrated pest management, reduced insecticide use, and development of alternative control methods","Technologies":"Biological control, precision application techniques, and insecticidal resistance monitoring","People":"Populations at risk from insecticide exposure, non-target species, and the environment","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental organizations, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Indiscriminate use of DDT for malaria control","Impact":"Health risks to humans, development of insecticide resistance, and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Regulation of DDT use, alternative methods for malaria control, and public health education","Technologies":"Bed nets, larval control, and improved housing and sanitation","People":"Populations at risk in malaria endemic areas, agricultural workers, and communities near sprayed areas","Owner":"Public health agencies, international organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Exclusion of sub-Saharan Africa from Global Malaria Eradication Programme","Impact":"Continued high burden of malaria in SSA, potential for global spread of drug-resistant malaria, and unequal distribution of resources for malaria control","Mitigation":"Investment in malaria control in SSA, development of tailored interventions, and collaboration with local stakeholders","Technologies":"Diagnostic tools, antimalarial drugs, and vector control methods","People":"Populations at risk of malaria in sub-Saharan Africa, healthcare workers, and local communities","Owner":"International organizations, national governments, and non-profit organizations"}]}
